product_name: Paddlers Supply Company Paddle Park/Rod Holder Bungee Kit
long_description: This Paddle Park/Rod Holder Bungee kit from Paddlers Supply Company lets you mount a handy bungee so you can stow your paddle or fishing rod on your sit-on-top or fishing kayak. Use the bungee to stow your paddle or fishing rod along the chine of your kayak. Do-it-yourself kit includes detailed information. Tools required: drill, 3/16 and 3/32 in. drill bits, pop rivet tool, Phillips head screwdriver and slip joint pliers (channel locks). Kit contents: shock cords (2), pad eyes (2), lash hooks (2), 6 x 0.5 in. SS screws (4), 3/16 in. rivets (4) and additional shock cord. This Paddle Park/Rod Holder Bungee kit from Paddlers Supply Company is not recommended for use with composite watercraft materials.
short_description: This Paddle Park/Rod Holder Bungee kit from Paddlers Supply Company lets you mount a handy bungee so you can stow your paddle or fishing rod on your sit-on-top or fishing kayak.
